directions: Heat olive oil in a large (at least 3-quart) pot over medium heat. Add onion and garlic; cook until onion is soft and translucent, about 5 minutes. Pour in water, salt, and pepper; bring to a boil. Add celery, zucchini, and bell peppers. Boil for 7 minutes. Stir in all cabbages and continue to boil until cabbages are as soft as you like, about 30 minutes.
ingredients: salt and ground black pepper to taste
title: Vegetarian Cabbage Soup
